title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.
EB: The synchronization process should be successful and allow the user to synchronize both the .java file and the other resource without any issues.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the package viewer
2. Select a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file)
3. Attempt to synchronize the selected files
4. Observe that the synchronization process fails
